full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB CHOS SKOR LAS, ,BKA' SDOD BEG TZE LCAM DRAL GYI, ,GTOR CHOG SHIN TU 'KHYER BDE BA, ,BSTAN SRUNG DGYES PA'I ROL MO BZHUGS, ,
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): SHING SBRUL LHA BABS KYI DUS CHEN NYIN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(GNOD SBYIN BEG TZE LCAM DRAL GYI GTOR CHOG SHIN TU BSDUS PA BSTAN BSRUNG DGYES PA'I ROL MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SHING SBRUL LHA BABS KYI DUS CHEN NYIN DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD DANG GTONG BA LA SOGS PA 'OS YON TAN GYIS RGYUD PHYUG PA MI YI DBANG PO RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL LO, ,SVA STI, TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR DE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES SH'A SA DHA RAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
